mapper.update: insert into theater (ttr_no, com_id, ttr_cat, ttr_title,ttr_sdate, ttr_edate , ttr_place, ttr_time, ttr_alert, ttr_content) values (theater_seq.nextval, #{com_id}, #{ttr_cat}, #{ttr_title},#{ttr_sdate},#{ttr_edate}, #{ttr_place}, #{ttr_time}, #{ttr_alert}, #{ttr_content})
mapper.select: select ttr_no, com_id, ttr_cat, ttr_title, ttr_sdate, ttr_edate, ttr_place, ttr_time, ttr_alert, ttr_content from theater where ttr_no = #{ttr_no}
select ttr_no, com_id, ttr_cat, ttr_title, ttr_date, ttr_sdate, ttr_edate, ttr_place, ttr_time, ttr_alert, ttr_content from theater where ttr_no > 0 order by ttr_no desc, ttr_date desc
select file_name from file_tbl where ttr_no=#{ttr_no} order by file_kind
select file_name from file_tbl where ttr_no=#{ttr_no} and file_kind=1
select file_name from file_tbl where ttr_no=#{ttr_no} and file_kind=2
